unpublished-info.text: Click on Unpublish button, only if the topic docstate is published and it does not have any references to published ditamaps

smePath.fieldDescription: choose SME from the SME Pages

guidance-terms.fieldDescription: Guidance terms/keywords to drive search suggested guidance

sgtitle.fieldDescription: Configure curated title to display in suggested guidance
sgtitle.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-suggestedGuidance

guidanceOrder.fieldDescription: Guidance order/rank for keywords to drive search suggested guidance ranking
guidanceOrder.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-guidanceOrder

revision-date.fieldDescription: Provide revision date, else publication date will be used.
revision-date.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-revisedDate

is-publishing-point.fieldLabel: Is this map a publishing point ?
is-publishing-point.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc:isPublishingPoint

hideSearchWithInDocument.fieldLabel: Hide Search With In Document for pages generated through map ?
hideSearchWithInDocument.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-hideSearchWithInDoc

disableStaticToc.fieldLabel: Should TOC open up by default?
disableStaticToc.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-showStaticToc

tocJoinedSection.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-joinedSectionToc
tocJoinedSection.text: Enable Join View Globally For This Publishing Point

joinedSectionLevel.fieldDescription: Level at which joined section will be applied and all the sub children page data will be combined and presented at this level. For big content like FASB, It is recommended that the level should not be at the root rather it should be 3 or higher
joinedSectionLevel.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-joinedSectionTocLevel

overrideGlobalJoinSettings.fieldDescription: Details for Individual Chapters where at some specific level join view should be applied. Provide equality sign separated values for Chapter Number, Level. Example 1=3, for more details on this refer to the confluence page

disablePdfDownload.fieldDescription: Choose yes for bigger maps like FASB, AICPA etc.
disablePdfDownload.fieldLabel: Disable PDF Download for pages generated through this map ?
disablePdfDownload.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-disablePdfDownload

seeAlsoSection.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-seeAlsoSectionEnabled
seeAlsoSection.text: Enable See Also Section For This Publishing Point

contentType.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-seeAlso-contentType
contentType.fieldLabel: Content Type for See Also References

seeAlsoMaxDisplayCount.fieldLabel: Max Items To Display Under See Also
seeAlsoMaxDisplayCount.fieldDescription: Max items to be displayed under see also section. If actual referred items are less than this limit then actual number of items will be displayed
seeAlsoMaxDisplayCount.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-seeAlsoMaxDisplayCount

autoSetReferences-info.text: Click on Auto Set References button, only if you want to set used in references to each DITA topic.

usedIn-container.jcr:title: Select to include in See Also

content-type.name: ./jcr:content/metadata/pwc-seeAlso-topic-contentType
content-type.fieldLabel: Content Type for See Also References

header.note: Title|Content ID|Dita Topic Path|Last Published Date
